pull.title: fuzz: Use mocktime in process_message* fuzz targets
pull.body: Use mocktime to allow time to advance deterministically during execution of a fuzz input. This also allows to drop the call to `JumpOutOfIbd`.

comments.body: Now that `TestChainState::JumpOutOfIbd` is unused we can drop it?
I think there are some other pull requests using it, so I'll keep it for now
